metadata.name: Hidden User Creation
metadata.comment: Detects creation of a hidden user account on macOS (UserID < 500) or with IsHidden option

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dscl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('uniqueid')) AND process.cmd_line rlike '\(\[0-9\]|\[1-9\]\[0-9\]|\[1-4\]\[0-9\]\{2\}\)' OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dscl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ishidden')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('true')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('yes')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('1')))))

output.summary: Detects creation of a hidden user account on macOS (UserID < 500) or with IsHidden option

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1564.002/T1564.002.md
